doc-level.para: Aston Villa defenders Ron Vlaar and Nathan Baker are both doubts because of respective calf and hamstring problems.

table-row.table-cell: Brad Guzan and Gabriel Agbonlahor have overcome minor injuries, while Ciaran Clark is back from suspension.
Thomas Vermaelen (knee) is a doubt and Theo Walcott has been ruled out for the rest of the season.

para.list-item: Aston Villa haven't beaten Arsenal at home in 14 attempts since coming from two goals down to win 3-2 in December 1998 (D7, L7).
Arsenal have lost only three of their subsequent 30 league meetings with Villa, including a 3-1 home defeat on the opening day of this season.
Aston Villa have not beaten Arsenal home and away in the same season since the inaugural Premier League campaign of 1992-93.
